description.purpose: Evaluate agent adaptability to changing user goals across authentication, transaction lookup, and dispute filing.
description.relevant_policies: Banking and Financial Services Chatbot Policy
description.notes: User begins with a login issue but shifts to querying a transaction and eventually initiating a dispute, requiring multi-tool adaptation.

instructions.reason_for_call: Issues logging in, suspicious card activity
instructions.known_info: You are Maria Santos with phone number +15551234567, date of birth 1986-02-11, and email user.001@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Login reason failure, latest transactions, how to dispute
instructions.task_instructions: Assist the user through login issues, then surface recent transactions and resolve a disputed charge.

ticket: Customer facing login issues, suspects a fraudulent transaction, wants to dispute it.

nl_assertions: Agent verified customer identity before accessing account information
Agent reviewed recent transactions with the customer to identify suspicious activity
Agent initiated a dispute for the unauthorized transaction and explained next steps

description.purpose: Bill payment completion to statements - EASY_2 persona (easily distracted)
description.relevant_policies: Confirmation before payments; single tool per turn.
description.notes: User completes pending payment, then gets distracted and wants to see statements.

instructions.reason_for_call: Complete pending bill payment, then check statements
instructions.known_info: You are Jordan Smith with phone number +15558675309, date of birth 1994-09-02, and email user.002@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: How to access statements after payment
instructions.task_instructions: Get help finishing your bill payment, then ask to see recent statements.

nl_assertions: Agent confirmed payment details before processing the transaction
Agent provided clear instructions for accessing and understanding statements
Agent maintained focus on the task when customer became distracted

description.purpose: Hard shift from budgeting to fraud response - HARD_1 persona (suspicious)
description.relevant_policies: Re-auth before security-sensitive actions; lock card and dispute handling.
description.notes: User starts skeptical about budgeting advice, then reports fraud and demands immediate security.

instructions.reason_for_call: Ask about budgeting tools, then report suspicious charge
instructions.known_info: You are Taylor Johnson with phone number +15551230987, date of birth 1991-05-06, and email user.003@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Whether you can trust this agent with fraud report
instructions.task_instructions: Start by questioning budgeting features, then report an unauthorized charge you noticed and demand immediate card security.

nl_assertions: Agent took the fraud report seriously and acted with urgency
Agent explained each security action being taken to protect the account
Agent provided clear next steps for the fraud resolution process

description.purpose: Template conversion: Authentication to fraud response using declarative goal shifts
description.relevant_policies: Banking authentication and fraud response policies
description.notes: Converted from action-based to declarative system. Tests MEDIUM_1 persona with auth→fraud shift.

instructions.reason_for_call: Need to verify my identity, then report suspicious activity
instructions.known_info: You are Taylor Johnson with phone number +15551230987, date of birth 1991-05-06, and email user.003@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Specific transaction details for the suspicious charge
instructions.task_instructions: Start by getting your identity verified, then once that's sorted, report the unauthorized charge you noticed and get your card secured.

nl_assertions: Agent completed multi-factor authentication before accessing account information
Agent reviewed the suspicious transaction details with the customer
Agent explained the dispute process and next steps clearly

description.purpose: Authentication to balance overview - EASY_1 persona (polite, detail-oriented)
description.relevant_policies: Use single lookup path; avoid full PII.

instructions.reason_for_call: Confirm identity then check account balances
instructions.known_info: You are Casey Williams with phone number +15551234590, date of birth 1982-03-09, and email user.004@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Which accounts you have and current balances
instructions.task_instructions: Get your identity verified, then ask for a summary of your account balances.

nl_assertions: Agent provided clear authentication instructions for the customer
Agent presented account balances in a clear and organized manner
Agent offered to explain any unfamiliar terms or concepts

description.purpose: Account overview to statements - MEDIUM_2 persona (curious learner)
description.relevant_policies: One tool call per turn; concise summaries.

instructions.reason_for_call: Check balances and learn about statements
instructions.known_info: You are Riley Brown with phone number +15559876543, date of birth 1989-10-21, and email user.005@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: How to access and understand account statements
instructions.task_instructions: Ask for account balances, then learn about how to get and read your statements.

nl_assertions: Agent provided a clear and organized view of account balances
Agent explained how to access and interpret account statements clearly
Agent offered to answer follow-up questions about account details

description.purpose: Account overview to dispute - HARD_1 persona (suspicious, questioning)

instructions.reason_for_call: Check balances, then challenge a suspicious charge
instructions.known_info: You are Alex Morgan with phone number 555-123-7890, date of birth 1980-04-15, and email alex.morgan@email.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Whether you can trust this agent to help with disputes
instructions.task_instructions: Demand to see your balances and transactions, then challenge a charge you think is fraudulent.

nl_assertions: Agent thoroughly reviewed Alex Morgan's account activity
Agent handled the dispute request professionally and efficiently
Agent explained the dispute process and next steps clearly

description.purpose: Large payment fails, then security request - MEDIUM_1 persona (business-focused)
description.relevant_policies: Explain failure and next steps; prioritize security if fraud suspected.

instructions.reason_for_call: Pay large bill, then secure account due to fraud concerns
instructions.known_info: You are Maria Santos with phone number +15551234567, date of birth 1986-02-11, and email user.001@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Whether your card has been compromised
instructions.task_instructions: Try to make a large payment, then when security concerns arise, demand immediate card protection.

nl_assertions: Agent handled the large payment request with appropriate security measures
Agent proactively addressed potential fraud concerns and took protective actions
Agent clearly explained the security measures and next steps

description.purpose: Card lock then status check - EASY_2 persona (easily distracted)
description.relevant_policies: Lock cards for safety; confirm status.

instructions.reason_for_call: Lock misplaced card, then verify what happened
instructions.known_info: You are Jordan Smith with phone number +15558675309, date of birth 1994-09-02, and email user.002@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Current card status after locking
instructions.task_instructions: Ask to lock your card temporarily, then check what the status is now.

Agent provided reassurance about the security of the locked card

description.purpose: Card unlock request to dispute filing - MEDIUM_1 persona (business-focused)
description.relevant_policies: Security protocols before unlock; dispute handling.

instructions.reason_for_call: Unlock card, then file dispute for unauthorized charge
instructions.known_info: You are Taylor Johnson with phone number +15551230987, date of birth 1991-05-06, and email user.003@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Dispute process details
instructions.task_instructions: Request card unlock, then immediately file a dispute for an unauthorized transaction.

nl_assertions: Agent verified customer identity before processing card unlock
Agent clearly explained the card unlock process and timing
Agent guided through the dispute filing process for the unauthorized transaction

description.purpose: File dispute then check status - EASY_1 persona (polite, detail-oriented)
description.notes: User needs to file a dispute for an unauthorized charge and check its status

instructions.reason_for_call: File dispute and track its progress
instructions.known_info: You are Casey Williams with phone number +15551234590, date of birth 1982-03-09, and email user.004@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: How dispute process works and timing
instructions.task_instructions: File a dispute for the unauthorized charge, then ask about the status and next steps.

nl_assertions: Agent verified customer identity before accessing account information
Agent reviewed the unauthorized transaction with the customer
Agent clearly explained the dispute filing process and timeline
Agent provided the dispute case number and next steps
Agent did not transfer the customer to a human agent when the goal changed

description.purpose: Dispute filing to card lock - MEDIUM_2 persona (curious learner)

instructions.reason_for_call: Dispute charge and learn about protecting account
instructions.known_info: You are Riley Brown with phone number +15559876543, date of birth 1989-10-21, and email user.005@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Best practices for account security
instructions.task_instructions: File a dispute for a suspicious charge, then ask about securing your account and card.

nl_assertions.assertion: The assistant should identify and acknowledge the suspicious charge and explain the dispute process
The assistant should explain the steps being taken to secure the account
The assistant should provide clear instructions for monitoring the account and recognizing fraud
The assistant should confirm the dispute has been filed and provide a reference number

communicate_info: Your dispute for the unauthorized charge has been filed
Your card has been locked for security
You'll receive a confirmation email with your dispute details
The dispute process typically takes 7-10 business days

description.purpose: Transaction review to statements - HARD_1 persona (suspicious, questioning)

instructions.reason_for_call: Scrutinize recent transactions, then demand written statements
instructions.known_info: You are Alex Morgan with phone number 555-123-7890, date of birth 1980-04-15, and email alex.morgan@email.com.
instructions.unknown_info: Whether the bank is hiding any transactions
instructions.task_instructions: Demand to see all recent transactions, then insist on getting official written statements.

nl_assertions.assertion: The assistant should thoroughly review recent transactions with Alex Morgan, explaining each one clearly
The assistant should acknowledge Alex's concerns about potential hidden transactions and address them professionally
The assistant should explain how to access and interpret the official statements
The assistant should provide information about statement frequency and availability

communicate_info: You can access your official statements through...
Statements are typically available within 3-5 business days after the statement period ends
You can view up to 24 months of statements online

description.purpose: Transaction review to dispute - MEDIUM_2 persona (curious learner)

instructions.reason_for_call: Review transactions to understand charges, then dispute one
instructions.known_info: You are Maria Santos with phone number +15551234567, date of birth 1986-02-11, and email user.001@example.com.
instructions.unknown_info: How to identify and dispute unauthorized charges
instructions.task_instructions: Ask to see recent transactions to learn about them, then when you spot an unfamiliar charge, ask how to dispute it.

nl_assertions.assertion: The assistant should clearly explain each transaction to Maria in a way that helps her understand her spending
The assistant should help Maria identify potentially unauthorized transactions and explain why they might be suspicious
The assistant should clearly explain the dispute process and what Maria can expect
The assistant should provide Maria with a dispute reference number and next steps

communicate_info: I can see a transaction you don't recognize for...
To dispute this charge, I'll need to...
Your dispute has been filed with reference number...
You should receive an email confirmation within...
